casebody.data:
Morris, Appellee, v. United Ohio Insurance Company, Appellant.

[Cite as Morris v. United Ohio Ins. Co., 103 Ohio St.3d 462, 2004-Ohio-5706.]

(Nos. 2003-0878 and 2003-1018 Submitted October 13, 2004 Decided November 10, 2004.) Freund, Freeze & Arnold and Kevin C. Connell, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed and the cause is remanded to the court of appeals for consideration of the remaining assignment of error and disposition in accordance with Kyle v. Buckeye Union Ins. Co., 103 Ohio St.3d 170, 2004-Ohio-4885, 814 N.E.2d 1195.

Moyer, C.J., Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor and O’Donnell, JJ., concur. Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., dissent.
